title: Pros and Cons of New Client after First Impressions
body:
Overall Impression is definitely positive, but it has room to grow (it is an alpha after all)

Pros:
Love the feel of it.  Much smoother and more polished.
Overall client looks so much better.
Chat is easily accessible but you can also get rid of it and get the conversation back easily.

Cons:
Dont see how many others accepted match.
popup for finding a map is delayed past the time the client pops up when off screen.
teams uneven.  We had a diamond player and the rest silver and gold, and they were silver and gold with 2 unranked players with <200 won games  (might just be because its blind pick instead of team builder.
no tabs in post game for statistics and such.
Probably not yet enabled, but cant change summoner icon.
Although it is prettier, changing ques is bulkier and takes longer.  Where you change queues is also not clearly marked.

replies.body:
You are right, some of the things you mention are still in development. As we release updates you'll start to see more shiny buttons! Pro tip: the client has a feedback button that you can use to send us all of your observations.

We do check the forums and take note of what is posted here, but we can more easily gather and aggregate the data submitted through the feedback tool.

Thanks for helping us test the client!
Thanks for letting me know. I had missed that.  Im going to go put this in there.

I don't think the new client affects matchmaking. However, I agree with the post game statistics. I personally feel like I rather have some detailed statistics inside the client as well. Maybe I'm just used to the current client?
No, I want some detailed statistics as well. It's annoying to open up the website just to see the damage chart.
